sentences.en: A bubbly drink; a bubbly soap.
sentences.cn: 多泡沫的酒; 多泡沫的肥皂.

sentences.en: As a person she is lively, bubbly and a happy go lucky type.
sentences.cn: 她为人是生气勃勃 、 快活热情而又无忧无虑的那种类型.
资产价格看上去充满泡沫.

sentences.en: Guests were presented with glasses of bubbly on arrival.
sentences.cn: 客人来后，都有香槟酒招待。

sentences.en: How is the desquamate on the hand, bubbly bubble treated?
sentences.cn: 手上脱皮 、 起泡泡怎样治疗?

sentences.en: IN RECENT months several countries have experimented with measures to cool bubbly property markets.
sentences.cn: 最近数月,多国试行房价调控措施,以抑制房地产市场泡沫.

sentences.en: Melt the butter over a medium-low heat. When it is melted and bubbly, put in the flour.
sentences.cn: 用中低火把黄油加热，等黄油熔化起泡时，加入面粉。

sentences.en: She had a bright and bubbly personality.
The economy must grow at a more sustainable, less bubbly pace.
sentences.cn: (认为)经济必须以一种更具可持续性更少泡沫的方式发展.

sentences.en: The effect of bubbly layer on vibration reduction of hull model is investigated experimentally.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍和讨论了舰船结构气幕减振的模型试验研究.

sentences.en: The influences of bubbly oil on the cavitation erosion in journal bearings inare investigated in detail.
sentences.cn: 试验研究了空气混入滑动轴承后对其气蚀磨损的影响.

sentences.en: Until then, Shanghai's bubbly bourse will likely remain what it is today: an internal affair.
sentences.cn: 在这之前, 上海充满泡沫的股票交易所将保持今天的样子: 国内事件.

sentences.en: When the strawberries appear very bubbly, the fermentation has begun.
sentences.cn: 当草莓出现丰富泡泡时, 说明发酵已经开始.

words.tran_cn: 气泡，泡沫，泡状物；透明圆形罩，圆形顶
冒泡，[化工] 鼓泡；气泡形成
